statements: SELECT * FROM nano_material_stability;
SELECT material_name, stability_condition FROM nano_material_stability;
SELECT * FROM nano_material_stability WHERE temperature > 100;
SELECT id, material_name FROM nano_material_stability ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, humidity FROM nano_material_stability WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT * FROM nano_material_stability WHERE material_name = 'Carbon Nanotube';
SELECT material_name, stability_condition FROM nano_material_stability WHERE temperature > 300 AND humidity < 0.5;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM nano_material_stability WHERE stability_condition = 'Stable' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM nano_material_stability WHERE stability_condition = 'Unstable';
SELECT * FROM nano_material_stability WHERE temperature BETWEEN 200 AND 400 AND humidity >= 0.4 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT material_name, temperature FROM MaterialStability WHERE pressure > 100
SELECT * FROM QualityControl
SELECT material_name, stability_condition FROM MaterialStability WHERE temperature < 50
SELECT qc_id, test_result FROM QualityControl WHERE test_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT material_id, stability_condition, temperature, pressure FROM MaterialStability
SELECT material_name, stability_condition, temperature FROM MaterialStability WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM QualityControl WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT material_name, stability_condition FROM MaterialStability ORDER BY stability_condition DESC, material_name ASC;
SELECT qc_id, test_result FROM QualityControl WHERE material_id = 2 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaterialStability JOIN QualityControl ON MaterialStability.material_id = QualityControl.material_id WHERE QualityControl.test_result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM stability_conditions;
SELECT material_name, temperature FROM stability_conditions WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT id, material_name, temperature, pressure FROM stability_conditions ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM stability_conditions WHERE material_name = 'Steel' AND pressure < 100;
SELECT id, experiment_id, stability_score FROM stability_data WHERE stability_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM stability_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND pressure < 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT material_name, humidity FROM stability_conditions WHERE humidity BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY material_name ASC;

SELECT SC.material_name, SD.stability_score, QC.pass FROM stability_conditions SC JOIN stability_data SD ON SC.id = SD.experiment_id JOIN quality_control QC ON SC.id = QC.experiment_id ORDER BY stability_score DESC, pass ASC;
SELECT * FROM stability_conditions WHERE material_name LIKE '%glass%' OR material_name LIKE '%plastic%' AND (temperature < 30 OR humidity > 60);
SELECT material_name, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM stability_conditions GROUP BY material_name HAVING AVG(temperature) < 40 AND AVG(humidity) > 50;
SELECT * FROM NanoMaterial;
SELECT material_name, stability_rating FROM NanoMaterial WHERE stability_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM StorageConditions WHERE temperature < 25 AND humidity > 50;
SELECT material_name FROM NanoMaterial ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, stability_rating FROM NanoMaterial JOIN StabilityReport ON NanoMaterial.material_id = StabilityReport.control_id;
SELECT material_name, stability_rating FROM NanoMaterial;
SELECT * FROM QualityControl WHERE control_passed = TRUE;

SELECT NanoMaterial.material_name, StorageConditions.temperature FROM NanoMaterial JOIN QualityControl ON NanoMaterial.material_id = QualityControl.material_id JOIN StorageConditions ON QualityControl.condition_id = StorageConditions.condition_id;
SELECT control_id, control_date, control_passed FROM QualityControl WHERE control_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT StabilityReport.report_id, QualityControl.control_id, NanoMaterial.material_name, QualityControl.control_passed FROM StabilityReport JOIN QualityControl ON StabilityReport.control_id = QualityControl.control_id JOIN NanoMaterial ON QualityControl.material_id = NanoMaterial.material_id;
SELECT * FROM NanoMaterials;
SELECT material_name, temperature FROM NanoMaterials WHERE stability_condition = 'stable';
SELECT test_id, test_date, test_result FROM StabilityTests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT material_id, image_url FROM MaterialImages WHERE material_id = 5;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM NanoMaterials;
SELECT material_name, stability_condition, temperature FROM NanoMaterials;
SELECT * FROM StabilityTests WHERE test_result = 'Pass';
SELECT condition_name, description FROM TestConditions ORDER BY condition_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaterialImages WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT material_name, test_date, test_result FROM NanoMaterials JOIN StabilityTests ON NanoMaterials.id = StabilityTests.material_id;
